text:
July 28, 1959
Mr. William Harlan Hale
Woods End Lane
Westport, Connecticut
Dear BUI;
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming
NAEB Network offering. I thought you might be interested in what
the nation's educational radio network is doing â€¢ I also thought
you might have particular interest hi the programs listed on
pages 9, 10, 13, 14, 19, 20, 23, 39, 41, 44, 45, 52, and 53.
Sincerely,
hjsos
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
